subject: Climate & Environment
title: Sustainable Fishing Practices
description: A short lesson to help you apply Sustainable Fishing Practices.

hook.text: Iceland nearly destroyed its cod fishery. Then it rebuilt it with strict quotas and science.

buildup.text: Catch limits based on fish population data allow stocks to reproduce and recover.

discovery.text: Community-managed fisheries in the Philippines have doubled fish catches inside protected zones.

twist.text: Illegal fishing still removes $23 billion worth of fish per year, undermining legal efforts.

climax.text: Satellite tracking and AI monitoring are helping catch illegal trawlers in real time.

punchline.text: Fish the ocean wisely and it feeds you forever. Overfish and it stops.

quiz.question: How much fish is removed by illegal fishing each year?
